content.detailedDescription: I was taking out the trash around 7:00 pm and saw a orange star in the sky.  it was to the north of my house. i noticed it was moving slowly towards the direction of my house. my first thought was ufo and then i said to myself its probably a satellite or something. i then continued to do the trash after i finished i returned to look at it. as soon i returned the object got brighter and it split into two objects. both objects looked smaller now and one remained in the same spot while the other one went off to the east. they both disappeared about 7 seconds after the split. after the sighting i was pretty excited to have seen that but i was also disappointed with my self for not getting a video camera when i first saw it. i waited for about 20 minutes to see if it would reappear then went inside.
content.summary: Orange star moving splits into 2 then gone

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on a bench waiting for a bus, when i looked up in the sky in front of me, and saw a object that looked like a white balloon, yet it didn't move around like a balloon, and moved in a straight line of its own volition, i watched it come from the n to south, heading over the ocean.

it went behind me, and i didn't see it anymore.

this was in long beach, ca about 7 am in the morning.

i just watched it and didn't know what it was, it had no wings, and didn't divert from its flight path.
content.summary: Saw at 4th and orange n to s looked like white balloon

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up at 4am and i saw some sort of light out the corner of my eye from the direction of the sliding glass door in my bedroom. i then looked out the glass door to see a very large round/circular like object, glowing green/blue above the tree line toward the ocean. it darted up/down and side to side. very fast! very erratic! then it just shot out of sight in a second. 

we live in paradise park and our bedrrom windows and doors face towards the ocean. we live in the middle of the subdivision between paradise dr. and makuu dr..  this is the first time i have seen this sort of thing.
content.summary: Saw a large circular glowing green/blue object

content.detailedDescription: March16,2006 i was in my room, there was an electrical storm outside, out of nowhere this intense energy permeated my room, i was standing at the time watching television,i heard and felt this low humming sound, i was literaly knocked on my ass, everything in my room was alive with light and overwhelming energy,suddenly the television screen changed, there i was me on t.V. then words started forming, you are a dragon, monkey! again out of nowhere like watching a movie superimposed over my own reality i was literaly shown the creation of life on our planet, a fish crawling out of the water and all the ofshoots of the species, the tree of life.I have never felt such fear in my life! i can only explain this next scenario as thought tranferance. words started coming in my brain, like a computer being downloaded with information,they said to me, do not fear little one, you are god, we live in you as you! for the next 3 weeks i was in lucide state of awarness, being shown the secrets of the cosmos. after that my battle for life had begun. i have lost all my hair and have scars like burns all over my body. they conveyed to me that they are testing something on me they called nanomolecular technology. they are here waking us up one by one! the colective event december 21, 2012. when all knowledge of the tree of life will be revealed. what is really crazy is that i was raised catholic, you have no idea of how difficult this was and is for me, this went against everything i was taught. i suffer silently. who will help me? i know there is something inside of me. i feel like molten metal, i can literally see the light inside of me, i was imbued with the power of a vemana! i have so much information, please help me, i am on the edge. i am willing to undergo any testing so the truth can be told. i have seen amazing things, so much more than i can state here. please help me,so i can help others with this new paradigm. i am on the edge. please, please, help  me! a child of the light. *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: I  was contacted by the pleaidiens

content.detailedDescription: I had been sleeping restlessly upstairs (with stomach distress) from 12:34 am until 4 am.When i finally decided to get up to drink some herbal tea so i could feel better. turns out i had food poisoning but long story short, my cat was up with me and i noticed her watching outside of our lr windows downstairs. i had my back facing those windows but when i turned around to see what see was looking at i saw a very bright rapid traveling light in front of our house moving low in the horizon from east to west, followed by another rapid bright traveling white light and then a red light (exactly like the first two but red). if i were to discribe them, i would say they looked like bright laser lights. i felt like i was watching starwars in front of my house. i yelled upstairs at my husband to see if he was awake and told him i had just seen some very strange lights. when i looked back out, the roof of a neighboring home adjacent to ours lit up with a circular pattern above it. i then jumped up to run to the window and i asked my husband if he had seen anything. he had gotten up and pulled the blinds open but had not seen the lights. i didn't hear anything or see any motor vehicle lights; we had just received a snowfall which is rare in our area, so it was very quiet out. there could not have been any aircraft flying in this weather, nor was there any traffic going by. the entire time from when i first awoke til after these lights disappeared, the sky had an eerie hue to it. lights were reflecting off of the low lying clouds. my cat was acting strange and kept watching outside the window. i have never seen anything like this and wished i had felt better when i woke up so i could have focused more on what i was seeing. i am now obsessed with what i saw and wonder if anyone else in my area had seen any strange lights. i'd say i was scared more than curious at the time though.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 horizontal flashes of light, first two white, then red, all laser like traveling east to west at a very fast pace

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i went out looking for this girl that i met home address.  so we proceeded on brooks rd off wetumpka highway.  while driving on brooks rd, during a warm summer night approx. 9:00 p.M., i notice some blinking lights in the south night sky. and i asked my brother what are those blinking lights in the sky? and his response was an airplane. and i told him that can't be a airplane with all of those different color lights, such as green, yellow, red and blue.  so still while driving, we came to a small bridge and i looked back up in the night sky, and still this object was still in the same place as if it was not moving.  but the lights were still blinking. about an 1/2 mile before entering highway 231, the object with the blinking lights was still up there as if it was up there amongst the stars.  and before appoarching highway 231, there was a house on the left side where a deep ditch runs in front of the home. and the ditch was about 6ft wide and approx. 2-3 ft deep.  and all of a sudden this light in the night sky came down and covered the car and all i saw was red. this happened all in a matter of seconds. since i was driving, my brother may i have witness more of what i seen.  my brother and i was so afraid that my brother opened his door-being the passenger door and tried to get out and i being afraid that my brother was going to leave me. i pulled him back into the car. and as me pulling him back into the car in an upright position, there was no more lights or anything as if it disappeared. during all that time the car was in the ditch.  i can not understand even to this day, how the car got out of that ditch.  and i asked my brother how did we get out the ditch, and he said they pulled us out of that ditch. after being back on that main road from out of that ditch. i was to scared to turn back and go the way we came from. so i proceeded to go on to highway 231 to go back home. i must have been driving 120-130 miles an hour to get back home. and my brother said to me you gonna get a ticket driving this fast. and i said to him, the police can give me a ticket but it wont be till i got home. when we got home the time was about 9:30 or 9:45, it seemed as if it happened so fast. we went straight into the house and told our mom about what we had seen. and she replied if yall dont get yall asses in bed, i'm gonna whip yall asses. as if we were crazy or something. every since that encounter i would not go out at night alone up until i left the state. whenever i go back to visit my family, my brother and i would somehow get on the subject of what happened that night. i still go back to that location only during the day. and what puzzles me, as i have gotten older, i ask myself why were there no one on that stretch of highway that night and the house that this happened in front of where normally people would be sitting out, there was no one. and on this busy interstate, there were no police present.  and here is something that is really astounding to me. i left home to come to mi and after being gone for several years. i got married and on the day that i gotten married. i called my mom to inform her that i had just gotten married, which she and no one back home knew that was the plan for me to be getting married. and she replied that your brother had just gotten married too on that same day. and this was the same brother that witness the ufo encounter with me. also my niece likes to hear of our encounter with the ufo.  and her and my mom have stated to me that they have also seen similar objects on a clear summer night.  and that they appear all the time.  i never missed a night of me gazing into night sky, wondering what is out there. i know what i saw that night, will come to the light of those who doesn't believe in ufo's. i also have on video of where the sighting occured along showing the deep ditch where the car was in at that time. trying to figure out how did the car get out of that ditch.
content.summary: Driving down 2 lane highway my brother and i. saw lights in the sky. that appeared to me as a ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello:

this is the second report i have submitted from novosibirsk.  i am a canadian who lives and works in siberia.  

i went outside my house for a cigarette and noticed what i thought was mars but i noticed it was in the wrong location.  i then looked with a little bit more concentration and noticed it was surrounded by three other stars and made what looked to be a cross.  

i then noticed it was too bright for a star and mars and was almost a violent red or burnning orange.  i then watched it change colour and become smaller.  at first i thought maybe there was cloudcover obscuring my view but the sky was clear and bright.

i then noticed a plane was coming close to that part of the sky and it then became smaller fast and gone.  i did notice some movement in an easterly direction but after about ten seconds nothing.  

as i noted in a sighting about a year ago my feelings were entirely one of observation and for the second time i didn't bother to grab my camera.

i since gone to look at the same spot and still nothing.  

i lost sight of the object simply because it vanished.


the witnessess to this event were my wife and her friend.  i am sorry but i can't be bothered filling in all their data and i have not asked for their consent so bare with me.
content.summary: It was a bright re/orange glowing star-like object.  it changed from bright red to orange and then white.  it was very big then small and then dissolved.

content.detailedDescription: At dusk a red lit is seen by my wife, going from east to east. when i got home at 1130 pm i saw it heading to the west. at 0200 we saw it agine heading east. and closer like its doing a grid pattern back and forth. am still looking for it to come back.
content.summary: red lite

content.detailedDescription:
This is really my roomates story to tell since my husband and i were asleep.  he filmed it for us. honestly we tried finding a logical explanation for this event but after watching the video numerous times.  we can't.  

we did discover that when we watched it in slow mode.  
these were not flashing orbs but rolling orbs.  what looks like flashing is it spinning forward and then back again.  plus there was not just one.  once it was slowed down you see more than one but like 2 stationary.  its so hard to explain really.  you also see it grow long and very bright and almost look like a scanner go up and down.

we just want to know what it was.  my roommate filmed all of this during a 45minute period.  first started at like 5:05am  then i think he sits in shock for a few minutes and then he films the rest from like 5:38 to like 5:45.
content.summary: Our roommate caught these led blue color flashing orbs on video outside the fromt of our house looking out over our neighbors house towards the east.

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My mother, myself, and another child whom she was driving to school, where on our way to school/work around 9:30-10:00am. about 5 miles from my mothers work, we noticed rainbows, very short about the size of the sun, on either side of the sun. we observed this for about 3 minutes. when we bagan to turn onto the highway, we saw a small black swirl appear in the center of the right rainbow. the hole stayed open for a few minutes, as we parked, we stepped out and continued to observe the rainbows and black hole. after a few minutes we noticed something begining to peek from the hole, it was silver and looked as if it was trying to roll up hill, under weak power before exiting the rainbow/hole. the silver ball object soon exited the black hole which closed behind this object. the object hovered at the exit point for about a minute. i could see small red points on it's outside. it then very slowly began to descend towards the ground finally disappearing behind the tree line. we waited and watched for about 10-15 minutes afterwards and never saw the object again. it appaeared to be about 20 miles away. and i would estimate it's size to be roughly 60ft in circumference. we were all mezmorized by the sighting, but suffered no adverse effects.
content.summary: Ball dropped from a black hole in a rainbow.

content.detailedDescription:
When i was 5 or 6 (in 1973 or 1974), my parents and i were in centerville, maine, where my father had been born - we lived in central maine, but went 'downeast" often to visit family, put flowers on the grave in town every memorial day, would go up to the old house where dad grew up, which was no longer habitable, and would stay with my aunt in town about 15 minutes away.

during one visit we had visited the old house and then were 'camping' out by sleeping in the car, and old rambler where the front seats folded down. we were parked on top of the hill by the cemetery and it was a clear night, stars were out, and not a soul around. centerville is ���out in the woods��� and a ways from anything, and at the time there were only a few families living in town. my uncle���s house was back down the road behind us, and some cousins down the hill in front of us.

we had been asleep a while and it had taken me a while to go to sleep as i was scared about the bears ��� lots of them in the area, but my mom and dad assured me we were safe.  i was also afraid of the dark, and while the stars were out, was a very dark night, so my mom laid next to me. the car was parked on the right side of the road facing what i think is east. i was laying on the left side of the car ��� driver���s side, closest to the pavement.

i remember waking up and hearing a loud noise, a very loud and high-pitched whirring sound. not like a fan really, but i guess more like a blender, but smooth.
i also remember it was very light in the car and i didn���t understand why. i could hear my parents talking and my mom asking my dad what is that, what is going, etc���

my dad opened the door on the right side of the car and said ���stay there.��� when he got out he just stood beside the door facing forward. my mom kept asking ���what is it, what���s wrong..��� he didn���t answer and her voice got more frantic as she kept asking. she was always calm so i started getting scared then.

she then climbed out behind my dad and i was not going to be left alone so i opened the driver���s side door and climbed out.

we were on top of a hill ��� lots of hills in the area ��� and when i got out i looked up and there in front of us ��� but out away from the hill and a little up, maybe 50 feet or so, was a very bright group of lights. i did not think of it as any sort of ���object��� as all i could see were lights. very bright, white light all around, which lit up the car, the road, the whole top of the hill. i could see the gate to the cemetery at the top of the stairs clearly to my left and my mom and dad on the right side of the car (the hill dropped off down to the right).

they were just standing there ��� my dad partly behind the right-side car door and my mom between him and the car. they were just staring up at the lights. not saying a word, not moving.

so i looked back at the lights. the whirring sound was so loud and seemed to keep getting louder and louder. in amongst the white lights was colored lights. they were moving or blinking or something, but i don���t remember any sort of pattern, just the colors. i remember the blues ands the reds, may have been others, but those i remember clearly.

i don���t know how long we stood there, i just remember looking at the lights and not moving. i didn���t feel afraid, and didn���t run to my mom or dad. i just stood there like they were.

the suddenly the sound got wicked loud and the lights just zoomed away from us ��� not all the far ��� but to above the top of the next big hill, maybe a mile or so. it stayed there 10 or seconds maybe and then went zoom to the right ��� almost parallel - and suddenly was over the trees a good ways to the right. must have been a couple miles i guess. suddenly it zoomed again and this time to the left and slightly away from us and was at least a few miles off, so went quite aways in an instant. the whirring never stopped and seemed just as loud.

the next thing i remember was that it was suddenly back in front of us, the whirring sound got so loud and it hurt and the light started to just go straight out away from us and up at the same time. this time it was not sudden and in a flash, just fast, and i watched it disappear into the stars.

my dad was then beside me pushing me into the car. i started to cry and scream asking what is going on. my dad said nothing, my mom had gotten into the passenger���s front seat and dad did turned on the car, and did a u-turn, and started driving. i kept crying and neither one of them said a word. my mom just started rubbing my arm as i was leaning over the front seat.

he drove to my aunt���s house about 15 minutes away and the whole way neither one said anything about what just happened. all my mom said was to my dad ���slow down, you���re going to fats ��� slow down!���

i remember we woke my aunt up banging on the door. i was still crying and she was asking why we were there, what was wrong, why didn���t we stay up in centerville.  i don���t remember the rest of that night, but later when i tried to ask my mom and dad about the lights they just told me it was nothing and as i got older and would tell the story my dad refused to even acknowledge it happened. he would leave the room, just not say a word.

i have no idea if it is related, but years later in 1996 i had an arterial rupture in my lower intestines and started bleeding. i had to have blood transfusions and they went in through my backside into my intestines to put in a medical clamp. after i came to the doctor asked me when did i have surgery down there. i told him i never had. he said yes i did. i had had some kind of surgery in my lower intestines/rectum. i asked my dad if something had happened i could not remember when i was a kid (i had my tonsil out i remembered) and he said no, nothing. i kept asking are you sure, the doctors said i did and he said no.

after we saw the lights i had several strange experiences at home, which i just chalked up to being a kid sensitive to paranormal things. there was the man floating in my closet, the glowing man kneeling beside my bed when i was awake and could not move and could hear my parents in their bedroom getting up. i also had a ���vision��� of seeing myself out side with my dog playing in the dark ��� i was afraid of the dark so made no sense ��� but the next morning when my mom woke me up my pajamas had mud on them, but the front door was still locked from the inside, so they used to talk about that wondering how i had gotten mud on me. another time i saw a strange face in the front door window looking in at me and it was not a man���s face.

could they be all related to the lights that night? i don���t know ��� could be something else, but i do know what we saw that night was not normal, was no plane or anything else as nothing moves like that.
content.summary: Object hovered over car - shot outward - across the horizon - back then straight out

content.detailedDescription: This just happend...Just went outside to have a smoke. bored, i flashed a lazer pointer up to sky, 4 quick flashes. got a huge bright flash back. excited as hell i started flashing more, kept getting flashes back! ended up with a total of 3 bright white almost blueish flashes back and 1 small red one, same spot, and way up right off oriens shoulder. the flashes where about the same size as my fingernail if held up to the sky i suppose. so incredible, i mean they were super bright and perfectly square. had the chills for about 15 minutes after and feel refrehes and energized for lack of better words. sorry for the typos im just so excited lol
content.summary: Got an answer, i guess.

content.detailedDescription: Well i have no idea what just happend, i just went outside to have a smoke. being kinda bored i decided to point a lazer straight up and do 4 flashes. from way way up there got a huge super bright flash back, amazed, i kept flashing, all of a sudden got a small red and then 2 more huge bright ones back,about the size of my thumbnail if i held my hand up, same spot right off of orion's shoulder. i am wrighting this and have chills that will not go away (now about 10 min later ). i feel refreshed and rejuvinated and a lil freaked out.. man i dont even know what else to say, this was an amaizing experience. and feel very lucky.
content.summary: Flashing a lazer pointer up to dark sky, got 4 flashes back

content.detailedDescription:
July/august? 2007..Flying from texas to california; 

when flying, i love taking pictures of clouds (formations, types of..Etc..Etc.) i have numerous pictures. at one point, i saw these three lights in the distant, when i put the phone/camera down to clean the lens (4 seconds, max) they were closer. then gone in a matter of seconds. i thought i was seeing things.
can you please look at these and explain...

i will be happy to submit other pictures upon request. a pilot friend of mine, stated they were "orbs" and he and other pilots saw them many times.
content.summary: 3 lights above the clouds flying over nevada/arizona on my way to california

content.detailedDescription: i was walking across the street from my wifes friends house to go pick up my son at his grandmas house.. i randomly was just looking at the sky and i noticed some weird looking crafts were kinda coming from behind the moon. i took out my cell phone and called my brother he came running out and watched the event with me and my wife. a few seconds later the rest of the family came out and they were ranging from 7 to 64 years of age. there was about 6 or 7 at first and then more came out from this more bigger advanced ship( approximately 2 or 4 crafts came out) some of the crafts were blinking with a red and blue light some of them disappeared and re appeared. it kinda looked like they were conversing with each other and they slowly drifted away towards the area of my wifes mothers backyard. as we went to the backyard we saw them still doing the same thing they were doing ( floating around and moving extremely slow) as a few minutes past by my son went to go get binoculars and at the time me and my brother were laying on the floor outside looking upwords. he came back with the binoculars and we all looked through them and my family described it as looking kinda like a manta ray. then i pointed the binoculars towards one that was roughly 700 feet above me and it was close the the roof of the house far enough for it to look smaller than it appeared but it was still pretty close. as i pointed the binoculars towards it, it looked like it was spinning pretty fast( it kinda looked like a being painted it) with sun or gamma rays kind of deflecting of it so it made it look bright yellow ish. as it moved it started to look like it was changing shapes slowly or it was rotating. a few minutes past and they started going away and as they were out of sight a plane flew by( just a regular plane) and we could all tell the distinctive traits from what we just saw to a normal airplane.
content.summary: Different lights, lights were changing, the unkown crafts were multiplying and some seemed to go into a bigger craft

content.detailedDescription: Before i get started i have to say it is very hard for me to describe the events that took place without actually speaking in person to bring to life how scary and real this was for us we were followed for several miles with alot of things taking place as to what the space craft was doin and the manuvers it was making!!My girlfriend and i were driving north bound on rt 16 in nh in the area from dover to rochester nh it was around 7 pm as we were driving i noticed out my driverside window lights that apeared right over the tree tops and i noticed it was quite a large mass of lights configured in a sequenced way do to the glare from a light drizziling rain i rolled my window down and their it was i could see the metal type finish on the out side, it was traveling along at our speed in the sky above the trees approximately 60 mph it was gigantic with lots of lights going on and off some different in color all were square and at times it would use the lights to make it appear the the craft was a drifferent shape from time to time! i was scared to pull over so i kept driving  my girlfriend was next to me aand when she looked out she screamed what is it i said i think a ufo and i think it's following us! well 2 miles later she was yelling out the window franticly scared stop following us go away so at that point we were convinced it was! through out the whole time it followed us it dissapeared twice once it sholt off and upwards fatster than anything i ever wittnessed with a flash and dissapeared as  we kept driving looking around up in the sky through the windshield about 3 minutes later it rose up almost like from behind the trees to my left outside my drivers window again continuing to follow us it had a back in forth motion as it was staying right with us also dipping down a little and rising above the trees! as we approached a toll booth it went down behind the trees and dissapeared at the toll booth i pulled off the highway where i saw a state trooper and i jumped out and asked the trooper has anyone reported a ufo there was one just following us and dissapeared she looked at me like i had eight heads and said no! so i jumped back in my truck and kept going at the tree line was about to end and the sky opened up where theres a lowes it rose up from behind the trees again and followed us for a half mile as the tree line ended and we came around the corner where lowes came into sight it jumped higher in the sky and behind lowes further from us it then turned a burning bright red light hovered there for a few miutes and fizzeled out!
content.summary: Scary, very close, enourmous. change colors and followed us for several mi morphing in shape by using its lights

content.detailedDescription:
This event was unusual in that hundreds of people saw this event, although i only talked about it with a few dozen.

there were seven sighted objects. they were only points of light and moved slowly into stationary position about a mile in diameter over the airfield of whidbey island naval air station, near oak harbor, washington. one man came into my shop and told us about it and about 8 of us went out to watch together.

within 3 minutes the navy launched the 'ready 5' attack aircraft. (five minute launch) they launched three heavily armed f-14 aircraft. the f-14's chased the spots of light at about 3000 to 10,000 feet of elevation. the spots would remain stationary until the aircraft approached then suddenly dart away in some direction either vertical or horizontal. this silly chase went on for an hour. no weapons were fired, and none of the f-14's came closer than a couple hundred yards of the ufo's. eventually, (in about an hour) the ufo's tired of the game and simply accelerated vertically in formation right up and out of sight. other aircraft including helicopters were launched but no aircraft came close to them.

the lights of the ufo's was just large enough to see clearly like a white ball. approximate size was that of an f-14.

their acceleration was instantaneous, as was their stop. they would seem to slide across the sky, stop instantly, and return to their prior location. we could hear the f-14's but heard no noise from the lights.

my girl friend at the time was working in the control tower on base. when i asked her later what she saw on the scope, she replied... "it has been deemed classified, and since i don't want to spend time in leavenworth... you won't find out any thing from me."  she never did tell me anything..
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Seven bright lights  surrounding the naval air station at elevation

content.detailedDescription: Myself and a passenger were traveling down route 2 after work. upon reaching a long straight away on the route i saw what i first took to be an airplane in the sky. it was not moving to either side so i assumed it was coming toasted us. i even joked, "what's he going to do land on the road?!". as we neared it i could see it was a huge black triangular "craft". i stopped directly under it and put the car in park. we both pulled ourselves up onto the windowsill of our doors. as i looked up into the sky i was simply dumb founded by what i saw. it was about 100 to 150 feet up and it was huge. a triangular shape that was at least 100 feet long and almost as wide. it was absolutely still in the sky! no movement and absolutely no sound what so ever! the three tips were slightly rounded and looked to have what appeared to be a light at each end. the whole under side was covered with a vast network of trenches valleys and pipework of sorts. a totally overwhelming feeling of, "this doesn't belong here!" come over me. we sat under it for probably 30 to 60 seconds when it turned 90 degrees to it's left, towards the lake. again absolutely silently, no down draft, no jets. once it was pointed towards the lake, it shot away. in about 4 seconds it was beyond our sight. we were stunned and set there several seconds longer yelling exclamations of disbelief! one more strange bit of the sighting that never struck me until later that day was the fact that not one other car passed the sighting on this main route during a summer day. it was the single most amazing event of my life and i remember it today like it had just happened yesterday!
content.summary: We parked under a triangle shaped craft. it was totally still and silent in the sky approximately 100 to 150 feet above us.

content.detailedDescription:
I do not remember the exact month or date of this event even though my entire family witnessed it and dad called it into the police at the time.

note: i personally witnessed the daytime columbia shuttle destruction several years later, and the columbia event was far smaller in size than this one.

it is my best opinion that this was a iron meteor of immense size that passed through the highest reaches of the upper atmosphere ... except that it did not leave an a fire trail behind it... (as the space shuttle columbia did) and did not leave a visible smokey trail.

it maintained an exact heading and did not change size or shape and continued completely out of sight over the eastern horizon of texas. there was no visible calving of other burning objects, explosion or impact. the time it took to cross the entire night sky was less than 5 minutes. for size, i could cover the fireball with the ball of my first finger at arm's length. my guess of elevation was around 120,000 feet. it was massive. it burned a yellow orange but did not illuminate my surroundings significantly. (we were standing in our front yard in texas)

if i were to guess at it's size i would say the object was over 100 yards wide. it was at least 10 times the size of the space shuttle columbia. 

we were excited and talkative as we had time to watch and discuss the event.
content.summary: Massive fireball passing from east to west  from western horizon to eastern horizen

content.detailedDescription: I was starring up at the night stars while enjoying the jaquzzi.Living where i'm at is an approach for airlines to land.I see them go by all the time with lights on and strobes lit up and easy to identify.This thing was,well i don't know what i saw and was hoping somebody else saw this thing to.Its been on my mind ever since i saw it and i can't stop thinking about it and its shape. this object had a leading edge shaped like a finger nail curvature. so you could say boomerang! its leading edge was the finger nail arch and the trailing back edge was a concove arch,like two finger nail edges. with the left and right ends going to a point where both curvatures met. there was a distintive outline of an object with a center area to it.But the center area was almost completely clear almost like it matched the back drop od the night sky.The only difference is the middle portion had a slightly different color tint to it like and aqua colored water but just not that bright,tone the aqua color down substainually.There was no sound,no lights forward,on the bottom or at the back of this thing.I watched this thing make a change in its course and back again.From there it continued towards the ocean and away from my line of sight.It was amazing to me and it had to be under some intelligent control to move like it did.So i know what it saw and have to say it was either millitary or i saw something i never thought i would see? has any body seen something like this? gosh i would like to know?  wish i had my camera on me but i was wet and i never would have thought in my wildest dreams i would see this! *(wit's first name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Enjoying my jaquzzi and watched the finger nail shaped object fly by

content.detailedDescription:
We had just moved from philadelphia, pa to western north carolina. i was taking some photos for our family to see our small farm.  i stepped out onto our porch with my digital camera (canon powershot a530) made sure the lens was clean and began photographing the beautiful sunset toward the end of our road, over the larger pasture.  i remember the sky being so blue and clear against the contrast of the sunset.  the first photo i took was of the end of the road. a few seconds later i took the second photo. eager to see the photos i downloaded them from the media card onto my computer. 

at first i didn't notice anything but the sunset. later when i showed them to my husband he asked about the image in the upper left hand corner.  i was shocked to find an object in the photo that hadn't been in the previous photo! what the heck is it??  when i enlarge it on my photoshop program the object did not pixilate; it held its shape? 

we were watching ufo's over earth and realized a group of guys fishing in fayetteville, nc in january 2007 (the same year i took my photo) witnessed some sort of ufo.  that's when i dug out the photos and decided to send them to you.

attached are the two photos. i'm not certain that i want my information passed onto a third party until unless this photo has credibility.  i am a published author and would not want my readers or employer to judge me on this incident. i would truly appreciate your investigation of this object.
content.summary: Photo of unidentified flying object

content.detailedDescription:
It was the first day of hunting season in southern idaho area known as 'the south hills' in 1967. i was 14 on my first hunt. about 4:30 am my father and i came around a corner to see about 50 vehicles pulled off the side of the road so we stopped too. as we walked around the bend on the mountainous road going directly south from hansen, idaho a bright light became visible about 1 mile away. 

the light looked like a pile of burning magnesium about 2oo feed wide. some people thought it was an aircraft crash but i did not. it was far too bright (it lit up an area a mile wide as bright as day.) it was so bright you could read your watch (i did). i could have read a newspaper. about 100 hunters stood and watched it in silence.

suddenly it launched vertically (leaving no residue or damage to the area) and went up into the night sky so fast that it shrunk to a pinpoint then vanished and was invisible in less than 30 seconds.

then we got in our car and went deer hunting. as i recall, my father placed a report with the twin falls, idaho sheriff's office the next day.

everyone gasped in surprise at the speed of the thing when it launched. we were convinced at that time that it was a ufo. so was everyone there as i remember.

i wasn't fearful, just amazed and excited to have seen such a thing.
content.summary: Bright light at night seen from a distance of about a mile

content.detailedDescription: I was  in an alley behind a restaurant  on melrose avenue when i spotted three glowing objects about five blocks east and one block north of me gliding westward towards me. they were about 100-150 feet above the ground. i started to video them on my iphone and captured them for about ten seconds  but, unfortunately stopped videoing them to call my friend in the shop to come outside. i will never stop kicking myself for stop shooting as, for one thing my friend didn't answer, and for another what i saw next was absolutely unbelievable! as the objects dre near to above my head two of them became out of my line of sight behind a building but the one i could still see glided along silently about as high as a low flying hellicopter then began to accelerate forwards and climb vertically upwards then dissapear before my very eyes. the video i have appears to be three white dots like many pictures i have seen but if you watch it on a enlarged screen and pay close attention to the way they float and sort of weave it is bvious they are not planes or hellicopters. also they didn't appear as white dots in person, they were sort of conical shaped amber glowing objects about as big as volkswagon beetle and were not far above the power lines and very clearly dissapeared in an instant.
content.summary: 3 conical amber glowing objects glide along then dissapear.

content.detailedDescription: I was with my wife and step daughter camping by the lake we saw it land on the cloud tops sit and then exit very fast it stayed for about and hour never moved was obscured by the clouds but you could still sort of see it i have a picture
content.summary: Sat in cloud top for an hr or so then left very fast

content.detailedDescription:
so it started with me and my friends walking down his driveway at night. it was a clear night, the moon lit the area very well and you could see the stars clearly. as were walking and talking, i am looking up at the sky and notice how in the darkness with the stars, the stars were disapearing then reappearing like somthing was moving in front of it. thats when i noticed it was in a triangle shape and it had bright red flashing lights on the ends of the triangle. now i told my friends and they saw it too, but they both believed it was just military aircraft doing high altitude operations. but being an aviation enthusist my self and knowing a good amount of knowledge about planes, i knew this wasn't normal because no beacon light on a aircraft that high could be so bright, the 3 red lights couldn't be flying in perfect in triangle shape formation either. i eventually lost sight of the object as it moved over the woods and i lost sight of it in the trees. also, there was no sound it was dead silence, and nothing explains the movement i saw in front of the bright stars. and one more thing about the military aircraft theory, usually high altitude aircraft are used for survelance and stealth, so why would there be a bright red light on it? and if it was up sooo high, then it must have been moving way beyond super sonic because this was crusing at a fine pace across the sky, and the farther away a mobile object is, the slower it moves, this was a big triangle. my friends still dont belive me, but it was definitly not normal, other wise the government is doing some amazing things behind the publics back.

the video i provided isnt mine, the object i saw didnt drop white lights either. this is very similar in shape and brightness of the lights i saw.

*(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).
content.summary: Flying triangle with red lights at tips

content.detailedDescription:
I actually was not the one that captured it but i really would like to hear mufon comments about the video.
i know portuguese and i come from the same state the ufo was recorded, and i can tell that the reaction from the person shooting the video is extremely reliable. the pattern of the speech, the use of slangs and the harmony of the voice really seems to match the real excitement and disbelief of the moment.
it was first posted in you tube and reported by the local newspaper.
apparently people in the city of bauru, nearby agudos where the video was shot from, reported tremors, like small earthquake about the same time the video was shot.
so the local newspaper ran the story correlating the sighting with the reports of the tremor.
it would be really great if you could contact the person who posted it and try to get to the bottom of it.
here is the link for the video:
*(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).

here is the link for the newspaper:
**(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).

i hope to hear back from mufom soon.
this seems to be a very credible story and i am very intrigue to know your opinion.

best regards,

(wit's first name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Clear time day sighting

content.detailedDescription:
On tuesday febuary 22nd at 8pm i was watching a documentary on netflix with my wife when i looked to my left out my living room window and noticed a flashing bright red light low on the horizon about 2 miles away over the northern part of the devil���s den area on the weston/redding border. the devil's den preserve is a 1700 acre preserve that abuts several thousand acres of woods owned by the water company and the state of ct. it has no roads thru it and it is closed to the public at sunset. there were also several feet of snow and ice on the ground and it was around 20 degrees outside, so i doubt any hikers would be there during this time. the flashing light was just above the tree tops and unusually bright, much brighter than any airplane lights, it was flashing and drifting very slowly to the north. 

i took out my binoculars and while looking at it noticed two things. 1)it was actually several red and white lights flashing close together, very bright and had an l.E.D. quality to the light that was unnaturally pure and bright. 2)there was also a smaller orange, glowing, perfectly round object much dimmer (the color was similar to a setting sun but much smaller. just a dot) that was pulsing in concert with the much brighter red and white lights below it. it appeared as if the orange dot was pulsing in communication with the lights below it. this small orange ball was a separate object judging from the distance above and off to the side of the red/white object. (1000 ft?)

i went outside on my deck to view it and get a better look.
after observing this thru the binoculars for several minutes the red and white lights separated into two distinct larger objects. one red and one white. these two objects flew around each other doing what seemed to be impossible maneuvering at an extremely high rate of speed over a very small area. almost like two huge laser beam points dancing in concert together. the red and white objects were traveling so rapidly in close proximity to each other that they appeared at times as one red and one white streak of light "dancing" together creating pretzel like shapes. i could tell that this was not created by me moving the binoculars because the whole time, the orange dot was observed steady and unmoving in the same filed of vision. the orange ball was not making any noticable movement but kept its relationship steady above the slow drifting red/white display going on below it. 

after observing this for about 5 minutes all three objects slowly drifted below the horizon behind the tree tops. they either went lower or drifted further away past the horrizon. i continued to look in the direction with my binoculars for about an hour but saw nothing else out of the ordinary. 

i submitted a report to the nuforc website and to my amazement someone from redding reported seeing a double triangle shaped object with red and white lights fly low over their house on that same day. both reports were not posted on the nuforc website until the following day, so neither one of us could have known about the other until after both were submitted to nuforc.

after looking the next day during daylight at the point that this was observed on the horizon and compairing it to a map this puts the event at the following latitude and longitude - 41.264259,-73.39159. on tuesday febuary 22nd at 8pm local time.
content.summary: Strange light display and manuvers - several hundred feet above tree tops

content.detailedDescription: My name is *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg)and i was 17 years old at the time and i was down the street t my ffriends house standing outside having a chat. it time to be correct was 3:30pm in the afternoon in the city of orange in southern california. it was at this time when i was curbside and happened to look up in t the blue sky with no clouds in sight and noticed a super shiny disc object in the sky to the north. this object was a solid disc object that stood still in the sky for about 15 minutes and did not move. my friend thought it was a blimp or even some kite, but it was a solid disc shape and could not have been a blimp. it was like a silver solid rock was floating in the air. we stood and stared at this object and it seemed to change bright metallic colors and at that point we new were seeing something strange. i checked my watch at the time and it was now 4:00pm the object was still there in the sky with no sound or movement. at this time it began to slowly climb to a higher elevation and when i say this i mean very slow. it did this for about 10 minutes , but was still easily visiable to make out that it was a silver disc object somethng thati have never seen before! it was now about 4:05-4:10pm and my frien ad i never took our eyes off this object and watched it suddenly move from one direction to another like point a to b in a blink of an eye. to have been there and seen what my friend and i saw i would describe it as disappearing and reappearing. this silver object did this a total of three times in a triangle motion and disappeared right before our eyes. i have spent the rest of my life remembering this incident and it is something that i will never forget and picture the event over and over again. i never really told anyone about this because i knew my other friends and family would just laugh at me and say im crazy. i would like to know if anyone else has reported seeing ths on this exact day in 1997 march 21 friday. i just knew that i was lucky to see such a sighting in my lifetime, but te scarry thing is that what i aw was so unreal i cant believe what i saw, but it was real and im willing to take a lie detecter test and talk to anyone who wants to listen to my story. what made me come out now was that i have been watching several shows and the discriptions and events of some sounded just like mine. and i just wanted to share my story to people like you who i hope will take my story serious. im sorry no camera at the time and my friend **(name deleted--cms/sg) were the only eye witnesses. we talk about this sighting everytime we see one another.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Sharp silver disc shape with no visible windos door lines ect...Solid siver disc

content.detailedDescription: I was getting ready to leave my friends house at 1:15 am, my two friends and i decided to go outside and have a cigarette before i left. after about 15 seconds of standing there, she asked what that glowing, flickering light in the sky was. pointing above the mountain horizon, i saw what appeared to be a yellow/orange/white light glowing sporadically in the sky. i pulled my cell phone from my pocket and filmed it as steady as i could. we first argued that maybe it was a car pointing its light on the horizon directly at us, but then we realized that they would have to be very strong lights. we also talked that maybe it was a fire, however, that was disbanded because fires tend to glow softly from that distance. no, this was definitely above the mountain horizon.  after about 2 minutes or so, my friends asked what the other light in the sky was. however, looking only at the original, i had no idea there was a brighter, bluish-white, much more active glowing one to it's left. i recorded both close together in the second video. i had to leave and quit filming because it was late. when i got home, my step-father saw the video and recommended to be placed here.
content.summary: Two flashing lights above horizon

content.detailedDescription:
I was at work and work and live by the airport. i work graveyard and see planes coming in to land all the time, although i cannot actually see the airport itself from where i work. i saw what i at first thought was a plane coming in to land but it looked much bigger than any other plane i had ever seen coming in to land....It had 3 white flashing lights as if they were on the corners of a triangle. when i can see planes going towards the airport, they are as big as if you hold your arm out to the sky and they are about the size of an inch between your thumb and finger...This thing was about the size of 3 or 4 inches using the same method. i realized it was not a plane when it got way too low way too quickly and all the lights were white and flashing. on an airplane, only the back 2 lights flash and there are a multitude of different colored lights. this object was traveling level to the ground and was maybe 500 ft away at 100 feet in the air but its hard to estimate.... it got really slow and continued moving behind some trees and eventually went behind a storage unit that was in the foreground and i had to help a customer so i couldn't watch it anymore, plus there were just too many trees around. i do remember thinking if it was a plane, it was way too big, way too low, and traveling so slowly that it would have dropped out of the sky. i live by the airport and see planes taking off and landing all the time. this was not a plane or a helicopter or anything i know of. i listen to coast to coast am and mysterious universe so i hear stories about these triangular craft all the time and was just so astonished to actually see something. my mind was fighting with itself trying to explain what i was seeing. it seemed like it was pretty close to some apartment complexes and thought the lights were so bright that many people might have seen it, but then again this was at around 3:30 am.
i have seen other anomalous things...Once a "star" was following me and my boyfriend while we were walking home and when i pointed at it and said "is that star moving?" it took a 90degree turn without slowing down and sped up and got so far into the sky that it eventually disappeared. this was about 8 months ago. this event happened while i was telling my boyfriend about these 2 "stars" i had seen in the sky about a week earlier that i thought were just 2 stars. i had gone outside at 3am or so to smoke a cigarette and looking at the stars. ( i like to try to find satellites) and these 2 stars started moving at the same time in a slow arc and eventually got so high/small into the sky that they disappeared.
content.summary: Triangle with 3 white flahing lights
